title: Britain's Davis to fight Nurmagomedov for PFL title
text:
Britain's Alfie Davis will fight Russia's Usman Nurmagomedov for the PFL lightweight title in Dubai on 7 February.

The bout will be 33-year-old Davis' first since he beat Gadzhi Rabadanov in the PFL lightweight tournament final in August to win $500,000 (Â£369,000).

Nurmagomedov, 27, fought last month, earning a narrow win over Irishman Paul Hughes to make his fourth defence as champion.

After the bout, Nurmagomedov called out Davis, saying "anytime, anywhere, I am waiting for you".
summary: Britain's Alfie Davis will fight Russia's Usman Nurmagomedov for the PFL lightweight title in Dubai on 7 February.
